text: Hey <@UU9USHC5R>, you can have drag and drop in website pages and landing pages, but not yet in blog posts. We are experimenting with a few things for blog posts so stay tuned… :smile:
What Jess said! If anyone has thoughts or feelings about drag and drop in blog I would love to hear them :slightly_smiling_face:

After just having a content creator override my theme’s css and change all of a post’s font sizes to 14px (including headings) via the hs richtext editor… I am deeply afraid of giving away this amount of control in a blog post environment :grimacing:
Definitely fair. I will say that anything we do for blog will be control-able by the developer. So, the developer could turn off drag and drop for blog if they wanted.
That’s awesome! And I know at the end of the day it’s a business’ fault for giving design power to people like that, but when stuff like that happens we can’t showcase a website turned to :hankey:
